multiple-choice.question:
You repeatedly, and independently, flip three fair coins, until there are exactly two heads among the three flips. Define the random variable $X$ to be the total number of coin flips. For example, if the coin flips result in $$ (TTT), (THT), (HHH), (HTH), $$ then $X = 12$.
What is the expected value $\mathbb{E}(X)$ of $X$?
